mapper.select: SELECT sa.id assessId, sa.order_id orderId, su.username userName, ss.`name` shopName, sap.ap_num apNum, ROUND(AVG(sao.point)) totalPoint, so.order_time orderTime, sa.content_id contentId FROM se_assess sa, se_assess_point sao1, se_assess_point sao, sys_user su, se_shop ss, se_order so, se_apartment sap where sa.user_id = su.id and sa.ap_id = sap.id and sa.order_id = so.id and sa.assess_point_id = sao.id and sap.shop_id =ss.id and sa.id =#{assessId} group by sa.order_id , su.username , ss.`name` , sap.ap_num, so.order_time, sa.create_time, sa.`status`

SELECT sa.id assessId, sa.order_id orderId, sap.name apName, su.username userName, ss.`name` shopName, sap.ap_num apNum, ROUND(AVG(sao.point)) totalPoint, so.order_time orderTime, sa.content_id contentId
FROM se_assess sa, se_assess_point sao1, se_assess_point sao, sys_user su, se_shop ss, se_order so, se_apartment sap where sa.user_id = su.id and sa.ap_id = sap.id and sa.order_id = so.id and sa.assess_point_id = sao.id and sap.shop_id =ss.id and sa.user_id =#{userId} group by sa.order_id , su.username , ss.`name` , sap.ap_num, so.order_time, sa.create_time, sa.`status`, sa.id
